adjective.description: Relating to or designating the off side of an animal or vehicle; = "off". Now rare (in later use regional).

adverb.description: In a direction or position off or away from something; (Nautical) away from the shore. Also as noun in "to the offward" (Nautical): towards the open sea.

origin: Mid 16th century (in an earlier sense). From off + -ward.
